T.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, s.id as sid  from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join surveys s on q.surveyid = s.id join answers a on q.id = a.questionid and s.id = a.surveyid
T.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, s.id as sid  from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join surveys s on q.surveyid = s.id join answers a on c.id = a.questionid and s.id = a.surveyid
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, s.id as sid  from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join surveys s on q.surveyid = s.id join answers a on q.id = a.questionid
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, s.id as sid  from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join surveys s on q.surveyid = s.id left join answers a on q.id = a.questionid and s.id = a.surveyid
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, s.id as sid  from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join surveys s on q.surveyid = s.id left join answers a on s.id = a.surveyid
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid
